site_name: Basement Flat, 5 Cadogan Square, LONDON, SW1X 0HT
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 3 (submission of details - a) details of existing and new service runs [plumbing / drainage / hot and cold water / heating pipework etc] including details of any associated alteration to fabric including alterations to joists, walling, external outlets, etc; b) slate sample; c) York stone sample) of Listed Building consent LB/24/00030 (Internal alterations and refurbishment of internal and external doors, windows, wall, ceiling and floor finishes, including reinstatement of lost features; installation of secondary glazing and slimline glazing units to windows and installation of concealed air conditioning with a condenser unit in the courtyard)
